details:
verb
- to give or apply medications
= example: to give or apply medications
= synonyms: dispense
- to administer or bestow, as in small portions
= example: to administer or bestow, as in small portions
= synonyms: deal
- to perform a religious sacrament ritually
= example: to perform a religious sacrament ritually
- to work in an administrative capacity
= example: to work in an administrative capacity
= synonyms: administrate
- to direct the taking of
= example: to direct the taking of
